name: Jane Smith
bio: Jane is a senior software engineer with over 10 years of experience in .NET development. She's passionate about community-building and sharing knowledge with fellow developers.

name: John Doe
bio: John is a solutions architect specializing in cloud infrastructure and DevOps practices. He enjoys mentoring new developers and speaking at tech events.

name: Emily Chen
bio: Emily is a full-stack developer who specializes in modern web technologies. She coordinates our speaking engagements and helps recruit speakers for our monthly meetings.

name: Michael Rodriguez
bio: Michael brings his experience in community management and event planning to help grow our user group. He's focused on making RVNUG an inclusive space for all developers.
